013package org.apache.juneau.jsonschema;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.jsonschema.TypeCategory.*;
017
018import java.lang.reflect.*;
019import java.util.*;
020import java.util.function.*;
021import java.util.regex.*;
022
023import org.apache.juneau.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.json.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.parser.ParseException;
029import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.swap.*;
031
032/**
033 * Session object that lives for the duration of a single use of {@link JsonSchemaSerializer}.
034 *
035 * <ul class='notes'>
036 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe and is typically discarded after one use.
037 * </ul>
038 *
039 * <ul class='seealso'>
040 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-marshall.jm.JsonSchemaDetails">JSON-Schema Support</a>
041 * </ul>
042 */
043public class JsonSchemaGeneratorSession extends BeanTraverseSession {
044
045   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
046   // Static
047   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
048
049   /**
050    * Creates a new builder for this object.
051    *
052    * @param ctx The context creating this session.
053    * @return A new builder.
054    */
055   public static Builder create(JsonSchemaGenerator ctx) {
056      return new Builder(ctx);
057   }
058
059   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
060   // Builder
061   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
062
063   /**
064    * Builder class.
065    */
066   @FluentSetters
067   public static class Builder extends BeanTraverseSession.Builder {
068
069      JsonSchemaGenerator ctx;
070
071      /**
072       * Constructor
073       *
074       * @param ctx The context creating this session.
075       */
076      protected Builder(JsonSchemaGenerator ctx) {
077         super(ctx);
078         this.ctx = ctx;
079      }
080
081      @Override
082      public JsonSchemaGeneratorSession build() {
083         return new JsonSchemaGeneratorSession(this);
084      }
085
086      // <FluentSetters>
087
088      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
089      public <T> Builder apply(Class<T> type, Consumer<T> apply) {
090         super.apply(type, apply);
091         return this;
092      }
093
094      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
095      public Builder debug(Boolean value) {
096         super.debug(value);
097         return this;
098      }
099
100      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
101      public Builder properties(Map<String,Object> value) {
102         super.properties(value);
103         return this;
104      }
105
106      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
107      public Builder property(String key, Object value) {
108         super.property(key, value);
109         return this;
110      }
111
112      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
113      public Builder unmodifiable() {
114         super.unmodifiable();
115         return this;
116      }
117
118      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
119      public Builder locale(Locale value) {
120         super.locale(value);
121         return this;
122      }
123
124      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
125      public Builder localeDefault(Locale value) {
126         super.localeDefault(value);
127         return this;
128      }
129
130      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
131      public Builder mediaType(MediaType value) {
132         super.mediaType(value);
133         return this;
134      }
135
136      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
137      public Builder mediaTypeDefault(MediaType value) {
138         super.mediaTypeDefault(value);
139         return this;
140      }
141
142      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
143      public Builder timeZone(TimeZone value) {
144         super.timeZone(value);
145         return this;
146      }
147
148      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
149      public Builder timeZoneDefault(TimeZone value) {
150         super.timeZoneDefault(value);
151         return this;
152      }
153
154      // </FluentSetters>
155   }
156
157   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
158   // Instance
159   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
160
161   private final JsonSchemaGenerator ctx;
162   private final Map<String,JsonMap> defs;
163   private JsonSerializerSession jsSession;
164   private JsonParserSession jpSession;
165
166   /**
167    * Constructor.
168    *
169    * @param builder The builder for this object.
170    */
171   protected JsonSchemaGeneratorSession(Builder builder) {
172      super(builder);
173      ctx = builder.ctx;
174      defs = isUseBeanDefs() ? new TreeMap<>() : null;
175   }
176
177   /**
178    * Returns the JSON-schema for the specified object.
179    *
180    * @param o
181    *    The object.
182    *    <br>Can either be a POJO or a <c>Class</c>/<c>Type</c>.
183    * @return The schema for the type.
184    * @throws BeanRecursionException Bean recursion occurred.
185    * @throws SerializeException Error occurred.
186    */
187   public JsonMap getSchema(Object o) throws BeanRecursionException, SerializeException {
188      return getSchema(toClassMeta(o), "root", null, false, false, null);
189   }
190
191   /**
192    * Returns the JSON-schema for the specified type.
193    *
194    * @param type The object type.
195    * @return The schema for the type.
196    * @throws BeanRecursionException Bean recursion occurred.
197    * @throws SerializeException Error occurred.
198    */
199   public JsonMap getSchema(Type type) throws BeanRecursionException, SerializeException {
200      return getSchema(getClassMeta(type), "root", null, false, false, null);
201   }
202
203   /**
204    * Returns the JSON-schema for the specified type.
205    *
206    * @param cm The object type.
207    * @return The schema for the type.
208    * @throws BeanRecursionException Bean recursion occurred.
209    * @throws SerializeException Error occurred.
210    */
211   public JsonMap getSchema(ClassMeta<?> cm) throws BeanRecursionException, SerializeException {
212      return getSchema(cm, "root", null, false, false, null);
213   }
214
215   @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "rawtypes" })
216   private JsonMap getSchema(ClassMeta<?> eType, String attrName, String[] pNames, boolean exampleAdded, boolean descriptionAdded, JsonSchemaBeanPropertyMeta jsbpm) throws BeanRecursionException, SerializeException {
217
218      if (ctx.isIgnoredType(eType))
219         return null;
220
221      JsonMap out = new JsonMap();
222
223      if (eType == null)
224         eType = object();
225
226      ClassMeta<?> aType;        // The actual type (will be null if recursion occurs)
227      ClassMeta<?> sType;        // The serialized type
228      ObjectSwap objectSwap = eType.getSwap(this);
229
230      aType = push(attrName, eType, null);
231
232      sType = eType.getSerializedClassMeta(this);
233
234      String type = null, format = null;
235      Object example = null, description = null;
236
237      boolean useDef = isUseBeanDefs() && sType.isBean() && pNames == null;
238
239      if (useDef) {
240         exampleAdded = false;
241         descriptionAdded = false;
242      }
243
244      if (useDef && defs.containsKey(getBeanDefId(sType))) {
245         pop();
246         return new JsonMap().append("$ref", getBeanDefUri(sType));
247      }
248
249      JsonSchemaClassMeta jscm = null;
250      ClassMeta objectSwapCM = objectSwap == null ? null : getClassMeta(objectSwap.getClass());
251      if (objectSwapCM != null && objectSwapCM.hasAnnotation(Schema.class))
252         jscm = getJsonSchemaClassMeta(objectSwapCM);
253      if (jscm == null)
254         jscm = getJsonSchemaClassMeta(sType);
255
256      TypeCategory tc = null;
257
258      if (sType.isNumber()) {
259         tc = NUMBER;
260         if (sType.isDecimal()) {
261            type = "number";
262            if (sType.isFloat()) {
263               format = "float";
264            } else if (sType.isDouble()) {
265               format = "double";
266            }
267         } else {
268            type = "integer";
269            if (sType.isShort()) {
270               format = "int16";
271            } else if (sType.isInteger()) {
272               format = "int32";
273            } else if (sType.isLong()) {
274               format = "int64";
275            }
276         }
277      } else if (sType.isBoolean()) {
278         tc = BOOLEAN;
279         type = "boolean";
280      } else if (sType.isMap()) {
281         tc = MAP;
282         type = "object";
283      } else if (sType.isBean()) {
284         tc = BEAN;
285         type = "object";
286      } else if (sType.isCollection()) {
287         tc = COLLECTION;
288         type = "array";
289      } else if (sType.isArray()) {
290         tc = ARRAY;
291         type = "array";
292      } else if (sType.isEnum()) {
293         tc = ENUM;
294         type = "string";
295      } else if (sType.isCharSequence() || sType.isChar()) {
296         tc = STRING;
297         type = "string";
298      } else if (sType.isUri()) {
299         tc = STRING;
300         type = "string";
301         format = "uri";
302      } else {
303         tc = STRING;
304         type = "string";
305      }
306
307      // Add info from @Schema on bean property.
308      if (jsbpm != null) {
309         out.append(jsbpm.getSchema());
310      }
311
312      out.append(jscm.getSchema());
313
314      Predicate<String> ne = StringUtils::isNotEmpty;
315      out.appendIfAbsentIf(ne, "type", type);
316      out.appendIfAbsentIf(ne, "format", format);
317
318      if (aType != null) {
319
320         example = getExample(sType, tc, exampleAdded);
321         description = getDescription(sType, tc, descriptionAdded);
322         exampleAdded |= example != null;
323         descriptionAdded |= description != null;
324
325         if (tc == BEAN) {
326            JsonMap properties = new JsonMap();
327            BeanMeta bm = getBeanMeta(sType.getInnerClass());
328            if (pNames != null)
329               bm = new BeanMetaFiltered(bm, pNames);
330            for (Iterator<BeanPropertyMeta> i = bm.getPropertyMetas().iterator(); i.hasNext();) {
331               BeanPropertyMeta p = i.next();
332               if (p.canRead())
333                  properties.put(p.getName(), getSchema(p.getClassMeta(), p.getName(), p.getProperties(), exampleAdded, descriptionAdded, getJsonSchemaBeanPropertyMeta(p)));
334            }
335            out.put("properties", properties);
336
337         } else if (tc == COLLECTION) {
338            ClassMeta et = sType.getElementType();
339            if (sType.isCollection() && sType.getInfo().isChildOf(Set.class))
340               out.put("uniqueItems", true);
341            out.put("items", getSchema(et, "items", pNames, exampleAdded, descriptionAdded, null));
342
343         } else if (tc == ARRAY) {
344            ClassMeta et = sType.getElementType();
345            if (sType.isCollection() && sType.getInfo().isChildOf(Set.class))
346               out.put("uniqueItems", true);
347            out.put("items", getSchema(et, "items", pNames, exampleAdded, descriptionAdded, null));
348
349         } else if (tc == ENUM) {
350            out.put("enum", getEnums(sType));
351
352         } else if (tc == MAP) {
353            JsonMap om = getSchema(sType.getValueType(), "additionalProperties", null, exampleAdded, descriptionAdded, null);
354            if (! om.isEmpty())
355               out.put("additionalProperties", om);
356
357         }
358      }
359
360      out.append(jscm.getSchema());
361
362      Predicate<Object> neo = ObjectUtils::isNotEmpty;
363      out.appendIfAbsentIf(neo, "description", description);
364      out.appendIfAbsentIf(neo, "example", example);
365
366      if (useDef) {
367         defs.put(getBeanDefId(sType), out);
368         out = JsonMap.of("$ref", getBeanDefUri(sType));
369      }
370
371      pop();
372
373      return out;
374   }
375
376   @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
377   private List<String> getEnums(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
378      List<String> l = list();
379      for (Enum<?> e : ((Class<Enum<?>>)cm.getInnerClass()).getEnumConstants())
380         l.add(cm.toString(e));
381      return l;
382   }
383
384   private Object getExample(ClassMeta<?> sType, TypeCategory t, boolean exampleAdded) throws SerializeException {
385      boolean canAdd = isAllowNestedExamples() || ! exampleAdded;
386      if (canAdd && (getAddExamplesTo().contains(t) || getAddExamplesTo().contains(ANY))) {
387         Object example = sType.getExample(this, jpSession());
388         if (example != null) {
389            try {
390               return JsonParser.DEFAULT.parse(toJson(example), Object.class);
391            } catch (ParseException e) {
392               throw new SerializeException(e);
393            }
394         }
395      }
396      return null;
397   }
398
399   private String toJson(Object o) throws SerializeException {
400      if (jsSession == null)
401         jsSession = ctx.getJsonSerializer().getSession();
402      return jsSession.serializeToString(o);
403   }
404
405   private JsonParserSession jpSession() {
406      if (jpSession == null)
407         jpSession = ctx.getJsonParser().getSession();
408      return jpSession;
409   }
410
411   private Object getDescription(ClassMeta<?> sType, TypeCategory t, boolean descriptionAdded) {
412      boolean canAdd = isAllowNestedDescriptions() || ! descriptionAdded;
413      if (canAdd && (getAddDescriptionsTo().contains(t) || getAddDescriptionsTo().contains(ANY)))
414         return sType.toString();
415      return null;
416   }
417
418   /**
419    * Returns the definition ID for the specified class.
420    *
421    * @param cm The class to get the definition ID of.
422    * @return The definition ID for the specified class.
423    */
424   public String getBeanDefId(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
425      return getBeanDefMapper().getId(cm);
426   }
427
428   /**
429    * Returns the definition URI for the specified class.
430    *
431    * @param cm The class to get the definition URI of.
432    * @return The definition URI for the specified class.
433    */
434   public java.net.URI getBeanDefUri(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
435      return getBeanDefMapper().getURI(cm);
436   }
437
438   /**
439    * Returns the definition URI for the specified class.
440    *
441    * @param id The definition ID to get the definition URI of.
442    * @return The definition URI for the specified class.
443    */
444   public java.net.URI getBeanDefUri(String id) {
445      return getBeanDefMapper().getURI(id);
446   }
447
448   /**
449    * Returns the definitions that were gathered during this session.
450    *
451    * <p>
452    * This map is modifiable and affects the map in the session.
453    *
454    * @return
455    *    The definitions that were gathered during this session, or <jk>null</jk> if {@link JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#useBeanDefs()} was not enabled.
456    */
457   public Map<String,JsonMap> getBeanDefs() {
458      return defs;
459   }
460
461   /**
462    * Adds a schema definition to this session.
463    *
464    * @param id The definition ID.
465    * @param def The definition schema.
466    * @return This object.
467    */
468   public JsonSchemaGeneratorSession addBeanDef(String id, JsonMap def) {
469      if (defs != null)
470         defs.put(id, def);
471      return this;
472   }
473
474   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
475   // Properties
476   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
477
478   /**
479    * Add descriptions to types.
480    *
481    * @see JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#addDescriptionsTo(TypeCategory...)
482    * @return
483    *    Set of categories of types that descriptions should be automatically added to generated schemas.
484    */
485   protected final Set<TypeCategory> getAddDescriptionsTo() {
486      return ctx.getAddDescriptionsTo();
487   }
488
489   /**
490    * Add examples.
491    *
492    * @see JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#addExamplesTo(TypeCategory...)
493    * @return
494    *    Set of categories of types that examples should be automatically added to generated schemas.
495    */
496   protected final Set<TypeCategory> getAddExamplesTo() {
497      return ctx.getAddExamplesTo();
498   }
499
500   /**
501    * Allow nested descriptions.
502    *
503    * @see JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#allowNestedDescriptions()
504    * @return
505    *    <jk>true</jk> if nested descriptions are allowed in schema definitions.
506    */
507   protected final boolean isAllowNestedDescriptions() {
508      return ctx.isAllowNestedDescriptions();
509   }
510
511   /**
512    * Allow nested examples.
513    *
514    * @see JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#allowNestedExamples()
515    * @return
516    *    <jk>true</jk> if nested examples are allowed in schema definitions.
517    */
518   protected final boolean isAllowNestedExamples() {
519      return ctx.isAllowNestedExamples();
520   }
521
522   /**
523    * Bean schema definition mapper.
524    *
525    * @see JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#beanDefMapper(Class)
526    * @return
527    *    Interface to use for converting Bean classes to definition IDs and URIs.
528    */
529   protected final BeanDefMapper getBeanDefMapper() {
530      return ctx.getBeanDefMapper();
531   }
532
533   /**
534    * Ignore types from schema definitions.
535    *
536    * @see JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#ignoreTypes(String...)
537    * @return
538    *    Custom schema information for particular class types.
539    */
540   protected final List<Pattern> getIgnoreTypes() {
541      return ctx.getIgnoreTypes();
542   }
543
544   /**
545    * Use bean definitions.
546    *
547    * @see JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#useBeanDefs()
548    * @return
549    *    <jk>true</jk> if schemas on beans will be serialized with <js>'$ref'</js> tags.
550    */
551   protected final boolean isUseBeanDefs() {
552      return ctx.isUseBeanDefs();
553   }
554
555   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
556   // Extended metadata
557   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
558
559   /**
560    * Returns the language-specific metadata on the specified class.
561    *
562    * @param cm The class to return the metadata on.
563    * @return The metadata.
564    */
565   public JsonSchemaClassMeta getJsonSchemaClassMeta(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
566      return ctx.getJsonSchemaClassMeta(cm);
567   }
568
569   /**
570    * Returns the language-specific metadata on the specified bean property.
571    *
572    * @param bpm The bean property to return the metadata on.
573    * @return The metadata.
574    */
575   public JsonSchemaBeanPropertyMeta getJsonSchemaBeanPropertyMeta(BeanPropertyMeta bpm) {
576      return ctx.getJsonSchemaBeanPropertyMeta(bpm);
577   }
578
579   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
580   // Utility methods
581   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
582
583   private ClassMeta<?> toClassMeta(Object o) {
584      if (o instanceof Type)
585         return getClassMeta((Type)o);
586      return getClassMetaForObject(o);
587   }
588}
